Filter Bruker NMR Experiments

Source: R/RawGenerics.R
dot-filterExp_files.Rd

Filters experiments based on acquisition parameters and limits the number returned.

Usage

.filterExp_files(pars, exp_type, f_list, n_max)

Arguments

pars

Data frame. Parsed parameter data from acquisition files.

exp_type

Named list. Filtering conditions for acquisition parameters.

f_list

List. File paths of spectra and metadata (e.g., f_fid, f_1r).

n_max

Integer. Maximum number of experiments to retain (mainly for debugging).

Value

A list with filtered and sorted f_list and pars.

See also

.extract_acq_pars1d, .check1d_files_fid
